title: Low Gold is not high elo.
body:
In fact, it's not even medium elo. It's low elo, essentially the same thing as Silver/High Bronze.

I realize there's a difference between low and high bronze.

But if you're in low gold, you're only just barely climbing out of the cesspool of people that hardly even understand the controls of the game, let alone strategy. If you really think that getting into Gold 5 is an achievement, well it is. But it's nowhere close to where people are actually considered decent players.
